reviews.title: Very Comfortable Casual Pants
reviews.review_text: These are very comfortable casual pants. They are more comfortable than my jeans and they are very functional with all the pockets. I highly recommend. They appear to be well made.
Quality that fits and runs true to size. Perfect summer, fall weight fabric. Wash's and dries well. Easy to smooth out any wrinkles and fold and hang up

reviews.title: Wranglers Legacy Cargo Pants
reviews.review_text: I got these for my tall young teenage son. They may be tight if he fills out some. Too bad that you don't have tall sizes in your men's section in the "supercenter" large stores.

reviews.title: I wear them all the time
reviews.review_text: Good fit, comfortable, durable, good price. I wear cargo pants most of the time, and they are now all Wrangler. Even the pockets never wear out, in spite of all the junk I regularly carry in them. No drama, just function. I love them.

reviews.title: Great cargo pants at a great price!!
reviews.review_text: These Wrangler rip-stop cargo pants are really great. They're very comfortable and having the cargo pockets allows to carry much more stuff in your pockets . . . for example, your cell phone.

reviews.title: Good work pants
reviews.review_text: Made of durable fabric. Good for physically active work. Has some stretch quality to the fabric, so it gives a little. It would be nice if it came in more colors. It would also be nice if they made these pants for women.
I bought these exact same pants several months ago and after numerous washings they fit great. The new ones do not even button up. They are probably a 34" waist rather than the 36" on the label.
I like it so much wear the wrangler mens cargo pants everyday.And my friends ask me and tell I buy it from Walmart they like the cargo pant.They will buy the cargo pants.

reviews.title: Wrangler Men's Rip-Stop Cargo Pants
reviews.review_text: Great product at an excellent price. Very well suited to working in a warm/hot environment when shorts are not an option. Walmart sent wrong color, but the product is rock solid.

reviews.title: wrangler mens cargo pants are great
reviews.review_text: my husband loves these pants and they are comfortable to wear , we will order more as we need them , and they are 100% cotton the way he likes them , he hates the stretch kind

reviews.title: comfort flex waist cargo pant
reviews.review_text: my guys are always getting wet on the job or sweating! thanks to the material they dry out quickly! For the price if they wear them out I don't mind buying them another set of 5

reviews.title: Sturdy~!
reviews.review_text: Very hardy pair of pants. The second day after I got hired, I got a pair of these and haven't had to buy another for just under two years. Has all the pockets I need for everything, as well as being awesomely comfortable to work in.

reviews.title: Cargo Pants Convenience
reviews.review_text: These pants are very convenient for the work that my husband does. The various pockets helps him keep up with his keys, cell phone and other items. Keep making these pants because they are very convenient. Thank you

reviews.title: Not Wrangler - Do not order
reviews.review_text: The pants I received were NOT made by Wrangler. They were very thin material in size 4XL that were labeled with Chinese writing. They were also the wrong color. The store will not take them back so I have to mail them back.

reviews.title: Very comfortable, good deep pockets; not too deep.
reviews.review_text: The perfect pants for the guy on the go. Thgese cargoes are comfortable and stylish. Those extra pockes really come in handy for the hard woorking man that needs somewhere close to hold those loose items needed on the job.

reviews.title: Poor quality of material
reviews.review_text: I wear a size 48 in the waist and this type of pants do not fit without a tight snug. If you are going to purchase these type of pants get one size bigger

reviews.title: Great work pants
reviews.review_text: I purchased 2 pair of these for my son for Christmas. He was in need of light brown slack for work. These were a really good bargain. It is the style of pants that he prefers, has lots of pockets.

reviews.title: Good work or casual pants
reviews.review_text: Great pants and very comfortable. My only criticism is every time I order a new pair they're slightly thinner fabric than previous pairs. I assume this is instead of raising the price.

reviews.title: Runs very small!!!
reviews.review_text: Horribly small. If you're going to manufacture overseas, use U.S. standard sizes. Tried to return to our local store, but they didn't carry these. I had ordered online. So now? I have a problem!

reviews.title: great buy at a great price
reviews.review_text: light weight material for the hot weather I ordered 30" in length they seem to be 32" but Im not sending them back couldnt find them in any of the stores and the color is just great wont show the dirt

reviews.title: Worst pants ever.
reviews.review_text: These pants are the worst ever. I order three of them, they ripped when bending down or putting wallet in your pocket. I give them a one star for the way they fit.

reviews.title: Good work pants.
reviews.review_text: The pants are perfect for my work. I tried them on in the store and bought the only size they had that fit me. I waited a couple of weeks and kept checking for my size to come back in stock but they never did. I checked on line and here they are. Exactly what I wanted in all colors. Try it, like it, buy them all before they change the style. They came right to my door in a couple of days.

reviews.title: wrangler men's legacy cargo pants
reviews.review_text: this order also included a pair of black cargos as well. while i have had issues with some orders before, this order went exceptionally well. one pair of pants even arrived a day before projected arrival and i am very pleased with the fit and look of both pair.

reviews.title: Not Wrangler Rip-Stop, but Not a Total Rip-Off!
reviews.review_text: Although this wasn't what I ordered (These are NOT Wrangler, so one star off); they are very comfortable, Chinese-labeled, stylish, elastic-waisted w/drawstring, multi-pocketed, thin material pull-on pants that my fashion-conscious son LIKES! So, surprisingly happy with my purchase!

reviews.title: My husband loves these pants
reviews.review_text: My husband wears these ripstop cargo pants to work. Wish we could find them in the stores. He says they are comfortable and durable - and his favorites in a collection of many cargo pants... Always searching for the perfect pair - now I think he's finally found them!

reviews.title: Great looking pants
reviews.review_text: Bought the 32 x 38 because they didn't have our normal size 32 x 36 anymore... Not sure why they are skipping that size now, but it goes from 32 x 34 to 32 x 38... so your not allowed to be inbetween those heights,, I presume. Anyway other than the legs being a tad too long, they are great.

reviews.title: They're good enough
reviews.review_text: I work as a Security Guard and these pants work good for me. I like the side pockets that allow me to carry more stuff around. I appreciate that the button is metal and doesn't have any stitches that could wear out. The only negative is that, for me at least, crotch area where my legs rub together always wears out eventually. It tears open. I'm overweight so that may be part of the reason. I haven't kept track of how long they last, a number of months possibly a year. I would recommend these to a friend because, considering the price, they last long enough and they do feel good.

reviews.title: Misleading Name
reviews.review_text: I was looking for a pair of regular fit pants. Seems all I can find these days are "skinny" or "relaxed fit" / "comfort fit". When I saw "legacy" I assumed these would be a traditional cut pant. Nope, they are "comfort fit". I have no idea why the "Legacy" term applies to these. Pants are OK for the price, but not what I was after. If you want 'comfort fit" these will do the job.

reviews.title: Black Wrangler Men's cargo pants
reviews.review_text: Good quality, good fit. I had bought these pants in other colors but the store I was at did not have them in the color black. Finally found them in the black color and they are a good quality work/utility pants with extra pockets. I recommend them if your looking for a durable everyday casual pair of pants or good quality work pants.

reviews.title: OK, but not very tough materiel...
reviews.review_text: That's my only complaint. Feels sturdy enough for casual wear, but for tougher jobs I'd search a bit longer. One last thing: I asked a friend of mine about the brand, and he said that they're TWO versions that are sold. The lighter fabric versions like these, and nice ones like he had. The difference is night and day between the two. Overall: I'd keep my eyes pealed for the good ones, and pass on these.

reviews.title: they look sturdy enough
reviews.review_text: these are going to bw a xmas gift for a twin sin of mine. they both gor black pants just diff black pants and they bith got a cool top. to wear with them and some deess down shoes to complete the outfit 1 in red and black the other in geeen and black, handsome young men who now like their moms taste in clothing when i buy it. when they were teens they hated every single thing i bought them.

reviews.title: PERFECT for work!
reviews.review_text: I work in an industrial jungle gym with poor air conditioning, and these pants are light enough to keep me cool when the temps and activity climbs. Seriously, I would still be peeling myself out of my work jeans! I just ordered my 3rd pair to last the rest of the summer, and only issue is that I cannot find them in a store.

reviews.title: Definitely not what i wanted.
reviews.review_text: Work for Walmart, and Love wearing these to work there, they typically last 3-6 months per pair(i order 2 at a time). Ordered these 2 pairs... one is a size 46, BARELY FITTING and VERY TIGHT around crotch/thighs. The other... i swear to god is a size 44 or lower, the zipper goes down just when putting them on.... i ordered 2 size 48X32, got no where near what i wanted, AND ARE VERY TIGHT. Guess ill have to safely

reviews.title: Nice pants, wrong color
reviews.review_text: As you can see from the introductory graphic of this survey, the pants are gray camo. The pants I received are tan camo. Not a big deal, certainly not enough to warrant a return but it wasn't what I thought I was ordering. The quality is good as is the fit, just the wrong color.

reviews.title: Perfect for work and casual wear
reviews.review_text: I bought 4 pair of these for work since January and liked the look, fit and utility of these pants that I bought 4 more for casual, everyday wear. I was a jeans guy for years but these are by far more comfortable and practical. The fit is outstanding. They stay at your waist so you're not pulling them up all day. They run true to size and the rise is perfect. They are lightweight, cool and wear like iron. I've gotten them soaking wet a number of times and they've dried out completely within 15 to 20 minutes. I work in a rough environment and these pants have held up. Pockets are roomy and well placed for easy access but not bulky so they don't stick out and snag on rough edges. The cell phone pocket holds my iPhone 6 in LifeProof case securely but makes it easy to grab. That's about the max for the cell phone pocket but a larger size phone would easily fit in one of the cargo pockets.

reviews.title: Great value
reviews.review_text: High quality pants for about $20. You can buy a nicer pair of pants and pay around $60 a pair. I ordered the Rip-Stop pants instead of the Classic by accident. They are not as thick as the classic but they look nicer when I put them on and are very comfortable.

reviews.title: Favorite work pants
reviews.review_text: Started wearing these last year instead of my "jeans." They cost less, they're very durable and the comfort and mobility make them perfect for working in the yard, the house or the shop. I wear them year round and have recently purchased a pair of the lined ones for working outdoors this winter. Unfortunately they are seasonally stocked at my local Walmart, but, thanks to the Internet and Walmart.com I can get them year-round and the shipping is less than what I'd spend in gas to get to the local Walmart. THANK YOU!

reviews.title: Not a happy camper
reviews.review_text: They really went cheap on the construction of these pants. Just got them on May 21, 2021 and after only my second wear on May 25 already ripped in half. Shame. The older quality would last me atleast a year before the fading and the wear and tear starts to show. Please do better!

reviews.title: ripped the first time worn
reviews.review_text: Bought two pairs and they each ripped at the back pocket the first time i wore them. I've been wearing these pants for work for a year ...same brand / style, just a khaki color that was out of stock when i bought them this time. My photos will not upload for some reason.

reviews.title: Like the fit and material
reviews.review_text: I have a physically demanding job and need the pants to go with it. I have not had these long, so I cannot comment on the durability of the rip-stop material yet, but they are comfortable, material is a nice weight for the summer months, and the tech pocket is perfect for my phone. So far no complaints. They also have a 1 year warranty and that is a plus for me.

I just love these pants. Like wearing slacks but with extra pockets. Comfortable and breathable. Wasn't sure what to expect for the price but well worth the money. Pockets have Velcro which I am not too fond of the comfort and durability make it well worth the purchase.

reviews.title: Great Pants!
reviews.review_text: My teenage son loves these! They are high quality, comfortable, durable, have multiple deep pockets, and the price is great! The only complaint is it seems wrangler doesn't seem to understand there are thin tall people out there, who need a longer leg length in relation to a small waist size, especially with a teenager. He really needs a 30x33 or 30x34, and they only make them up to a 30x32. After they are washed and dried, the leg length does shrink! I try to get them out of the dryer, before they are completely dried. Then I pull and stretch the legs out. This helps a little, but not much! Other than the size issue, these are wonderful pants at a great value! Thanks to Wrangler and Walmart!

reviews.title: the best
reviews.review_text: These pants are the best. I gave up wearing jeans years ago and wear these all the time. They fit perfectly, have plenty of pocket room, are lighter than jeans, and look good. For $20 you can't beat it. With weekly washings, they'll last about 6 months before you start seeing fraying. I used to buy them at my local walmart, but they don't seem to carry them in store anymore, which is a pity.

reviews.title: Perfect travel pant.
reviews.review_text: I bought these pants for my hike across Spain. They are just as good, just as comfortable, just as durable as expensive hiking pants but at a fraction of the cost. I liked all the extra pockets too. Be sure to buy one size up for best hiking comfort to keep them slightly loose fitting for summer cooling.

reviews.title: Great pants - also for hot weather
reviews.review_text: These pants are comfortable - even when temperature is high, practical, hold out well, on top of that very affordable. Have been using these kind of pants (in hot climate) almost every day for 6 years now. The online shopping was effortless as usually.

reviews.title: never delivered
reviews.review_text: i bought these pants for work and it sent me an alert that they were delivered and they werent. i called customer service and i asked them to resend them expidited so id have them for work and they refused.They have no more pants in my area in my size.

reviews.title: Really Like the Wrangler Legacy Cargo Pants!
reviews.review_text: Other Cargo Pants I have need to be ironed before wearing. The pocket flaps ball up, and they look wrinkled out of the dryer. The Wrangler Legacy Pants have been washed and dried 3 times some far and can be worn straight out of the dryer. The corners of the pocket covers are the only thing that would need to be ironed if you are going to get picky. I bought the black pants and they are suitable for casual dress. The fit on the pair I got is prefect at the waist and lenght. The pockets are deep and roomy, and that was important to me. The velcro flaps on the side pockets allow easy access, and keep important things like your wallet secure. They have a leg that is a bit wider than I like, however all things considered they are the best cargo pants I own. I plan to order them in the other color tonight. I hope that helps you decide.

reviews.title: Cargo pants Wrangler
reviews.review_text: My husband decided to start wearing cargo pants instead of jeans because of the comfort and all the pockets. I couldn't find any in women's section that looked so well made. So I got online after measuring my inseam and ordered. Have to get used to them because unlike jeans the fit is baggy in the legs, fits great on hip (butt:) Wrangler quality is outstanding. Look great, COMFORTABLE and serviceable. Can't beat the price and shipping is only .97 cents.

reviews.title: Great light weight Cargo Pants
reviews.review_text: These fit as described and size was true after washing. Bought 2 pck and liked them so much bought another 2 pck. Like the dark green and khaki( light green) colors. They are light weight material but should hold up under normal ware. They are much cooler than jeans or the heavier weight pants I had. It's been really hot this year.

reviews.title: Wrangle Pants
reviews.review_text: I am a tall woman and it is very hard for me to find any kind of jeans or pants that will fit me, so I went looking and found these wrangle pants came in a taller size, purchased them and I truly love them. Now I feel like I've got pants on and not a high water (or short) pant, I feel very comfortable, and they wash up really good, they look good and they look good!

reviews.title: Not ripstop pants!
reviews.review_text: These are not ripstop as the video says they are. Just original thicker cotton cargo pants. These are less comfortable in a working environment than ripstop yet last longer. Only reason i bought these online is because my store never has any 38x34 in stock. Tired of having to drive 65 miles each way to return things that are not as stated online.

reviews.title: Wrangler Cargo Pant's
reviews.review_text: Dislike: 1) could not find in size I wanted. 2) button fly - could not undue/open or get button thru the hole, they made for the button. 3) went to use one of the cargo pockets, come to fine out the put the cargo pocket on top of the hidden tech pocket for your electronic devices. so, I was always trying to put something in the hidden pocket instead of the cargo pocket. plus, I did not like the fact that the cargo pockets kept closed were Velcro.

reviews.title: Good color and nice weight.....
reviews.review_text: I ordered these for a 12 year old student who loves to have lots of pockets. The material is unique - not too heavy nor too thin - and they look good after several washings. The sizing is just right. I really like the Wrangler brand as the prices are affordable and the quality is great!

reviews.title: Declining Quality
reviews.review_text: I‚Äôve worn these only a few times and the button pulled through the fabric. I could understand if the pants were tight but they were actually a little loose. This style was one of my favorites so I was pretty bummed. Not sure if I‚Äôll try another pair or not.

reviews.title: great product
reviews.review_text: Hey, I hate buying clothes, I buy them when I absolutely have to. I bought five pair of these jeans over two years ago to use for work. I have to replace them finally, not because they fell apart but because they have finally faded, and they have frayed so bad at the cuffs that it was time. The new ones I'm sure will last the same. Great product! I'll look for them again in 2 or 3 years.

The quality of the fabric in the Wrangler Men's Relaxed Fit Legacy Cargo Pants was excellent. I was very impressed and had ordered these cargo pants as a gift. The pants fit perfect and the person that I had bought them for was extremely satisfied and he even commented on the fabric. I also felt the price was great.

reviews.title: Black Wrangler Cargo Pants
reviews.review_text: I had bought a 4-pairs (Olive, Tan, Blue, and Black), the Black are my favorite pair, so I bought another 3-pairs. These pants work for me with their many pockets and very relax fit, so movement is never restricted. I do Construction Superintendent work in various locations inside and outside, these pants are and keep me comfortable no matter the what my environment seems to be. These cargo pants holdup in my construction areas as I work to install metal studs, drywall, plumbing, electrical, and a various of other things at the top or bottom of a 8-foot ladder. I highly recommend this pants to anyone who is looking for comfortable high performance pants that also look go in everyday life things

reviews.title: good pants
reviews.review_text: I've been wearing wrangler for along time, first for work pants and now for just about everything .Pants really last and for my body shape are the most confortable jean i found,why spend alot of money on less of a jean not me i,m proud to be a wrangler man. also if you know your size ordering online is the way to go .just so you know i,m 5-9 and about 195.

reviews.title: Great guy pants
reviews.review_text: My husband loves these cargo pants. He is a big guy and he loves the way they fit and all the pockets to hold his "stuff". What he DOESN'T like is the FLEX fit ones. He hates the pants with the FLEX in them so I hope they continue to make these pants that DON'T have the flex otherwise he may be pantless one day.

reviews.title: Exceeded expectations
reviews.review_text: I've owned many pair of Wrangler cargo pants in the past, and have worn most past the time when they should have been retired from my work wardrobe, so when I received these two pair I was pleasant surprised by how well they fit right out of the bag. And I'm about to order a few more pair. great product. comfortable, fit well, wear well.

reviews.title: One pair fit; one didn't
reviews.review_text: I bought two pair for my husband, same size according to the tags. One fit; the other was too small. It's probably a mis-tagging, and Wal-Mart was good about the return, but it was a trip to the store that I didn't need to make. That said, the pair that was tagged correctly is a true fit, is comfortable, and, given the Wrangler brand, will wear well, I assume. But, it's too soon to tell. The price is right, if it does live up to the Wrangler name.

reviews.title: Good value pants
reviews.review_text: I have been wearing Wrangler jeans and cargo pants for a lot of years now because I like the way they fit and can usually find a good sale on them. I have been having a hard time finding my size (30x34) in the stores though and ended up at Wrangler.com. I am very happy with these pants, they fit just like my other Wrangler cargo pants, however, they are thinner. But that does make them lighter weight and I think a little cooler, which is nice if you are working in a warm area. Overall, these are a great basic pant at a good value and I will be ordering more!

reviews.title: Great fit
reviews.review_text: Great fit, great deal. One thing to note is the (non-blue jeans) wranglers do not have a inside slot on the right leg. I put my phone on the inner part of the outer pocket on the right. Why do they put an inner slot on one side and not the other. Other than that minor quirk, the pants fit great and are a great quality especially for the price.

reviews.title: My husband's favorite
reviews.review_text: My husband is an engineer who needs clothes that both look professional and can take the environment of the workfloor, where he does hands-on work and can get dirty. These stand up beautifully, he says they are super comfy and fit great, and the price is excellent for reliable clothes. He has several pairs and would definitely recommend them.

reviews.title: I have bought this product over and over.
reviews.review_text: Just bought 4 more of them, as I do once a year typically. They are lightweight, which is why I buy them. Being in construction, I am required to wear full legged pants most of the time. They breathe great, and are very comfortable!!! They claim to be ripstop... That is why I don't give a 5 star rating. They rip. When they rip, they rip HUGE. Generally the back pockets rip the pants if you have anything in them. I just got my order of (4) pairs as usual. I bent over once with my field book in my back pocket and got a 7" rip down the back of my brand new ripstop pants. I think I will be looking for a new brand/style going forward.

reviews.title: Pant length did not March sizing
reviews.review_text: I bought these the same size that I wear and the length was longer than indicated on the sizing label. I actually had to get them hemmed. I know I could have returned them but that would have been either a trip to a store (20 miles away) or pay shipping for a return. It is cheaper to just have them resized.

reviews.title: Worth the price...
reviews.review_text: My husband loves these pants. He uses them every day for work, which is why we wanted to buy several pairs. The only issue we have with them is they are NOT true to color. The khaki is actually a greenish color, almost an army green. I ordered them once, seen that the color was "wrong", returned them and reordered them, expecting khaki this time. The second pair I got was the army green color again. Apparently that's their khaki color, even though the picture shows a much lighter color. Other than that, great pants!

reviews.title: I've owned a million of 'em!!
reviews.review_text: I've had so many pairs of these pants (probably 40-50 or more even)mostly in tan and the gray originally but those colors are getting scarce. I've always liked the style, obviously but the quality is fair at best. The good thing is the price since they don't hold up long. I would humbly ask that you bring back the grays and tans in common sizes please!

reviews.title: Great Product!
reviews.review_text: I purchased these as a replacement for my tried and true blue jeans, and I am glad I did. These are true to size, fit well, and are very light weight pants. They are great for casual wear, and just knocking around in. I was concerned about the quality, but this was an unfounded concern, they are wrangler quality, and the stitching and finish is great.

reviews.title: Not all the same material
reviews.review_text: Description on tag inside each pair of pants states that they are all 100% cotton. One pair is super soft, like when I buy them off the shelf in the store. The other 2 pair are rough and stiff like some kind of poplin material. Those 2 pair I'll probably be returning

reviews.title: big fan
reviews.review_text: I use these for work pants as well as dress sometimes and casual wear. I enjoy the relaxed fit since I am a bigger guy. I enjoy the cut of the pant and how breathable they ware. Never had a pair fade in the wash. They keep their color and on average they last me 2 to three years before I have to replace them. Can't go wrong and they are dependable pants.

I have been wearing these cargo pant for over ten years myself, I wear them for work leisure, almost all the time, I am in the maint business and they wear well. This new version is a joke, the only reason they could of changed is they found another vendor to make them cheaper and figure we‚Äôll still but them anyway. It‚Äôs not about the consumer anymore, it‚Äôs about the dollar. Probably bought 16 to 18 pairs of these a year. Have to go back to George pants at Walmart I guess.

reviews.title: Bad batch of material????
reviews.review_text: These are usually great pants. They always fit well, last long and are very utilitarian. Unfortunately as of the past few months, I've had to go through the arduous process of sending 2 pairs back. After the first or second wash the material just shredded like wet paper. If wrangler addresses the faulty fabric I'd buy more. I'm waiting to see how the replacement pair I got lasts and of course the pair that's on its way. Hopefully it was a limited issue.

reviews.title: I don't care for these pants
reviews.review_text: The texture of the fabric is such that it holds dog hair and doesn't release it easily. If you never go anywhere where there are pets, they'd probably be okay. Also, I would prefer buttons to velcro on the pocket flaps. The velcro is inconvenient for quickly reaching into the pockets when I need something and it scratches my hands when I do. I would have returned them but I felt obligated to keep them, since I didn't ask any questions about these problems.

reviews.title: light weight cargo pants
reviews.review_text: Husband really likes the fit of these pants. They are much lighter weight than jeans or regular cargo pants. So, much cooler to wear in hot weather. The rip stop fabric is an extra plus with these. Just wish they were a true Khaki color, still is green in color, would like a more beige in color. But for he price and having cooler pants to wear he enjoys them.

reviews.title: Wrangler - Men's Legacy Cargo Pants
reviews.review_text: This item was purchased as a gift, so I cannot speak specifically to this purchase. We have always been pleased with Wrangler pants, so I don't anticipate any issue there. However, I was particularly pleased that you had a very hard to find size. The prompt delivery was also a huge plus!

reviews.title: Great Fit waist to crotch
reviews.review_text: Nice fit at waist and crotch, rise is just right. These are relaxed fit so the legs and seat are a little roomy, more so then I prefer but not so much that I will return. My next order will be for a regular fit. Other then that these are great. The material is comfortable and lightweight. The 40x32 size fits as expected on my 6', 255 lb frame. I would recommend these.

reviews.title: Not happy didn't even receive item
reviews.review_text: I never received this item and was really upset we got everything else I got messages with pictures of the packages dropped off and this is the only pair my son did not receive so I would recommend this brand of pants because they take your money but didn't send the product

reviews.title: Loving it!
reviews.review_text: Several months ago, my parents purchased these grain khaki cargo pants for me. Once I started wearing this pair, I felt very comfortable. Because I have large hands, I really liked the deep side pockets, which I didn't have to cram my hands in there. I love the additional pockets found by the side of my knees. I also love the fact that when I crouch down, part of my rear doesn't show up. Furthermore, I have to always wear a belt, because these pants sag down as the minutes go by. Thank you to the Wrangler folks, who built these pants well!

reviews.title: I‚Äôm very unhappy with the service
reviews.review_text: I ordered mens pants size 40 x32 , I received size 44 x 30. Way off on size , You need to pay attention more to the size, now I have to go through the trouble of returning them. And they‚Äôre not in store so I can‚Äôt just exchange them. Have to go through the hassle of reordering and hope to get it right

reviews.title: I didn't think they made pants like these but best pants !!!
reviews.review_text: I am a overnight stocker and the regular wrangler pants rip within 3 to 4 weeks . So far so good with these pants but am wearing down the left knee area since I go down to one knee to throw the lower shelves. I was going to wait and review these pants after a month has past but i do like these alot more than the regular pants and they are much cooler to wear than the regular pants. Definitely worth the buy and I already bought my second pair !!

reviews.title: Both durable and comfortable.
reviews.review_text: My son prefers these pants to any he has tried for his comfort as a truck driver. They wash and wear well to suit my daughter-in-law, too. He requests these pants as gifts every Christmas and birthday because they are easy for me to find at Wal-Mart and he wears them every day.

reviews.title: Nice pants
reviews.review_text: The pants are great what I was looking for and at a very good price. The sizing seems true to size for my purchase, I bought 4 different pair and all seem to fit the same. Quality seems good haven't done any yard work or projects but I'm sure they will hold up well, the fabrics seems a bit thin only reason why I gave it 4 out of 5 stars. Overall good product for a good price.

reviews.title: I have purchased before and I am sure I will again
reviews.review_text: This product meets my expectations. I must ware a device called a CROW walker which comes almost to my knee. These trousers give enough leg room for the walker to be under the pant leg. This allows me to wear them when my wife and I go to dinner or shopping without looking like Darth Vader. I only wish they could be ordered in a 31 length.

reviews.title: Light, comfortable pants
reviews.review_text: The Ripstop fabric is light and breatheable so it dries easily and they aren't hot. The pockets are straight cut so they are easy to get into, but not so that the contents don't fall out. The crotch is roomy and the legs are straight cut. My only complaint is the 'extra pocket' in the top of the cargo pocket is only on the left side.

reviews.title: Great pants at a Great price
reviews.review_text: I have owned Wrangler rip stop pants for about 5 years and love them. It may be my imagination but I think they are cooler to wear in the summer heat, they breathe and dry faster when it rains. The thing I would like to see is for them to come in black or charcoal. I will buy them again. Walmart price is an excellent value, the online purchase made purchasing them easy.

reviews.title: one size smaller than labeled
reviews.review_text: Everything else was ok though the styling wasn't something I was into the fact that they were ripstop was attractive, but sizing and fit were off and that concerned me when and if ordering the next size up so I decided to not take the chance and have to send another pair back.

reviews.title: Love!
reviews.review_text: This pants are good for the price! My husband is on the tall and skinny side, so sometimes its hard to find pants to fit him good. These fit absolutely perfect. Not to short, not to long. The waist was a perfect fit and the color was exactly what he needed for work. The extra pockets come in handy, also. Hes able to carry more in his pockets that he needs for work. Very impressed and will buy more!

reviews.title: Great pair of pants for Landscaping/Mowing Company
reviews.review_text: These pants fit great and are very well made for a deal. I have looked at similar pants that cost three times as much from the more liked brands but i have to say these seem to be the better pick for price and quality. The two cargo pockets allow great storage and convenience, i can put all kinds of stuff in them and they dont feel too odd when i have items in them. The device pocket combo stitched behind the cargo pocket on the left hand side in genius! It fits my Samsung Galaxy S7 in an Otterbox case great and it i have not had a problem with it. Really a great design, only cargo jeans i can find so far that does this. Quality is great, i used one pair rigorously the summer of 2016 and by the end of the year no tears but small, not even pea sized holes started to emerge. From what they've been through it was defiantly worth the $20 for a single pant. I bought 3 more pairs for my company uniform this year. Doesn't seem to stain bad with grass/dirt, etc. Very happy purchase and will continue to buy them. Thanks Wrangler!

reviews.title: Length needed correcting.
reviews.review_text: I like these pants and have had many pairs in the past. These new ones have a big problem.... They are stated on the belt-band label and on the sales sticker as being 34 X 30 (the correct size for me). However on both pairs that I purchased I measured the leg length at 32" and 33" respectively. Therefor the lower hems had to be cut and re-sewn to fit. Not good.

reviews.title: Ripstop??
reviews.review_text: I don't usually do bad reviews, but these pants are terrible. I bought 2 pair for work about 6 months ago. Within 3 months the pockets started to wear through the front of the thigh. Now the holes are so bad I can't wear them to work. Both pairs. I have several pairs of the non-"rip-stop" wrangler cargos that are a year older and are in better shape. They do fit well and are comfortable. They just don't hold up. I find it hard to believe the military uses the same material. I'm very disappointed.

Very very thin...not the cargo pants Ive have gotten from the store. The material is noticably different. NormLy Inpurchase the Wrangler cargo pants in store but they never have my size so an emplyee said that Incould order them online...only problem is they are different. Cant stand these.

reviews.title: Wrangler messed up!
reviews.review_text: Right away upon opening I noticed a cheaper fabric but they washed well so they were put in the workwear rotation for work. After being worn 4 times the front pocket ripped, okay fixed what could have been a machine glitch. Now 11 wears in the button has ripped out. Get with the program people! Men wearing these for work are moving about and putting stuff in the pockets. Wrangler the new fabric is a big fail!

reviews.title: One change I wasn't expecting
reviews.review_text: After wearing Wrangler cargo pants for over 4 years now this new pair came with an unexpected change: the cell phone pocket was moved from the right leg to the left. I guess that might be great for left-handed folks. But it is an unpleasant change for me. Also, because the phone pocket was made shorter, the phone has a tendency to slide up when you get in or out of the truck - one day I am sure, it will fall out onto the ground. Otherwise, these pants are great, a little lighter weight which should be great for the summer.

reviews.title: Problem with sewing but OK
reviews.review_text: The pants were great just one problem, the left-hand lower side pocket was not sewed on the back side so nothing would stay in the lower pocket. Rather than sending it back, I had a lady at work resew it. I am planning on ordering two more pairs soon.

reviews.title: Good pants.
reviews.review_text: I have other Wrangler cargo pants and shorts and prefer the twill fabric (the pockets are thicker too), but these are the ONLY cargo pants I found in navy blue, so I was stuck. I have to wear navy at work. However, they fit just like the others in my closet. Spring is getting near, so Wrangler needs to offer navy cargo shorts as well.

reviews.title: Customer Service Was Excellent
reviews.review_text: I order two with 36" waist and they were to tight. I called customer service for a return and reorder in 38" waist. The representative I had was excellent and made the whole process easy. The 38" fit a little loose. I feel there is more than 2" difference in their waist measurements.

reviews.title: Great work pants
reviews.review_text: I was pleased with these pants but there was one problem. I ordered khaki and the confirmation email confirmed that khaki was ordered. The pants I received were green and the packing list showed that green were what was packed and shipped. Rather than return them and reorder I decided to just keep them. The green appears to be a khaki color with a green tint instead of a tan tint.

reviews.title: Cargo Pants

reviews.title: Wrangler rip stop cargo pants

My husband is very picky about his jeans but doesn't want to spend a lot. He also wears a hard to find size. Most of the places we looked or checked online didn't have his size. We found a very big selection of both sizes and colors and styles on the Walmart site. He tried them on when they arrived (the next day!) and liked them enough to order two more pairs, just to have plenty on hand.

reviews.title: They didn't disappoint.
reviews.review_text: The jeans came in on time and they were the right size. I didn't see any rips or tears. Or indications that they were not quality. As expected, Walmart came through. We'll be ordering more Jeans online.

reviews.title: Comfort and flexibility
reviews.review_text: My hubby drives heavy equipment at work and is jumping in and out of machinery all day long. We burn wood in the winter and cut and split our own wood. Plus all the other stuff to do around the homestead. So, the fact that these have the flex material in them is exactly what he needed. I've been buying them for him for about four years now. It's the only pants he wears. The funny, ironic, Freudian fact about these pants are I've been buying myself flex jeans for about twenty years and never thought about that type of pant for him. Anyway, if you men want that extra comfort, especially in the seat area, or you women want to give your man a nice surprise gift buy these jeans.

reviews.title: Made for working people, truly comfortable.
reviews.review_text: My husband only wears this brand of jean. Has tried others but prefers these over any. He's a very active man who works 2 full time jobs. Comfort is a must. The construction of Wrangler Jeans are definitely made for a working person. Simply throw into wash, no fuss at all. Size is always on point, consistency of material is a given.

reviews.title: I like them. ordered the wrong size, but it worked
reviews.review_text: I ordered these jeans without knowing my waist measurement. The last waist measurement I had was 52 in, At some point after that measurement, I dropped down to a 50 in waist. I tried to return them and order the smaller waist. Because of trouble finding a shipping center near me. Walmart customer support gave me credit for these as a courtesy. I plan to have my sister take them in two sizes. But in the meantime, I have worn them with a belt and they were comfortable and felt good.

reviews.title: Men's Wrangler Relax Fit Jeans
reviews.review_text: My husband really likes his new Wrangler relaxed fit jeans with flex. They have a loose fit without a baggy look. The flex is just enough for comfort when working, but they never lose their shape. They are also very durable, the material is strong without any stiffness. I definitely be purchasing more in the future.

reviews.title: Be sure to try on before you buy! Runs small !
reviews.review_text: These jeans "Look" a lot better than they "wear" . You have to get them at least one size too big, sometimes 2 sizes. Then there's baggy parts here and there just so you can get the waist and hips to fit. The pockets are small and hard to get your hands into, the "slit" is straight across instead of being at a slant. I keep a pair for working around the house but rarely wear them out in public!

reviews.title: no
reviews.review_text: I have tried to find cargo pants for men WITH a phone pocket on the left side to no avail. there are some out there, but the supply is not very big. I can't understand why, in this day and age when just about every man out there has a cell phone we have to shove in into one of the side pockets or worse yet into one of the back pockets where the chances of damaging it are much greater. I have been trying to find cargo jeans withe phone pocket in my size (34x29) to no avail. I would even settle for 34x30, but it seems no one wants to make jeans with a phone pocket. .

reviews.title: Thrown in the bag and delivered
reviews.review_text: My issue is not with the product, rather what was sent. The size and product wasn't remotely close to what was ordered, except the color. I ordered relaxed and got slim. Length was not even close to correct! It appears that whoever put together the order had some other agenda. Here is the best, I have to wait 10 days to get a credit against the charge. First lousy experience, but I might try again. Ugh!!!

It's hard to say what I liked or disliked since I still have not received them. After being told by several different assistants that they would be delivered. Can you please give me an idea as to when if at all I will receive my 3 pair of Wrangler jeans, size 38/

reviews.title: Not 99% Cotton 1% Spandex, Misrepresented
reviews.review_text: It seems IMPOSSIBLE to find 100% COTTON these days, these in a previous purchase were 99% COTTON, 1% SPANDEX but NOT my recent reorder!!! They are now 86% COTTON, 12% POLYESTER, 2% ELASTANE not what is listed in the specifications for the product, went back and checked and the page has not been updated. I try to avoid unnatural fabrics as much as I can by seems I am being lied to even why I choose carefully. Whether skin sensitivity or estrogen triggering fabrics it's a real problem staying NATURAL in just about everything from food, drink and clothing these days. Order carefully AND recheck the product labels before you wash. I this case I am very upset that I was deceived by a change in manufacturing that I had tried to avoid by careful selection when purchasing the product.

reviews.title: Wrangler quality and fit
reviews.review_text: The size I chose fit exactly as expected at the inseam, waist, and length. I did find them thinner than traditional denim. The jeans have some "give" when stretching during movement.I do not need a belt when wearing them, but could easily add one to add to my outfits. They are very comfortable and I would highly recommend!

I have never had a pair of jeans fit as comfortably as these fit. I usually don't talk about this subject. I am well endowed and my family jewels have never felt as comfortable as they did in these Wrangler blue jeans. I definitely recommend these jeans for any man who is well endowed or not.

reviews.title: Wrangler jeans at Walmart are 1/2 the price
reviews.review_text: I tried to order these FROM Wrangler, the shipping from FedEx transferred to USPS. They said my parents moved %26 they returned them to sender. Then I ordered again %26 used my address, the order was cancelled a couple days later because I didn't have a gmail account, which is weird because I get their emails %26 text messages. SO I looked at Walmart, the Wrangler jeans my dad wanted, are the exact one's and the correct size for 1/2 the price. No kidding, and Walmart delivered them out to him SAME DAY before 3pm. Kudo's to you Walmart! We'll continue to purchase from you guys. I do for food %26 prescriptions too.

Contrary to popular belief, just because the size is the same, doesn't mean it's the same fit. You have to look where it is made. I have better luck with Wrangler than even Lee, and I grew up wearing those. But now, give me these instead of the marked up trash from expensive manufacturers.

the jeans are great, but the accompanying odor was terrible. right out of the package, they had a musky odor and it was strong (i ordered two pairs btw) I washed them twice with a soak included and plenty of detergent, but it didn't put a dent in the odor at all. they were unwearable. I returned both pairs.

reviews.title: A Great Quality Product To Depend On!
reviews.review_text: My husband has been ordering these jeans for years, he is 6'4" tall and wears a size 38 x 34 and he can expect them to fit him the same every time he orders them. Wrangler jeans are good quality, you never get the wrong sizing like other products that are made nowadays and the pricing hasn't changed much in several years. They are my husband's go to jeans since he was in his twenties and now in his early seventies! He highly recommends these jeans! He also likes the flex jeans because they are so comfortable!

reviews.title: Great Jeans for a Great Price
reviews.review_text: Bought for a friend who's losing weight. He seems happy, tho I believe the sizing is a bit on the larger size, not a bad thing as they can be dried, lol. We may try the next size down shortly. All in all we are both satisfied. pricing was great for a "test" pair. Definitely be buying more.

reviews.title: My New Go-To Jeans
reviews.review_text: I've been on the hunt for a pair of jeans that are comfortable enough for all-day wear without looking sloppy, and these Wrangler Relaxed Fit Jeans with Flex are exactly what I was looking for. The relaxed fit gives me plenty of room to move, which is great, but the real game-changer is the "flex" fabric. It stretches just enough to make sitting, bending, and walking incredibly comfortable. The quality feels durable, like they'll hold up for a long time. They're a perfect blend of a classic look with modern comfort. I've already worn them multiple times since I got them, and they've quickly become my favorite pair. I highly recommend them to anyone who values both comfort and style.

reviews.title: Comfort and Style in One Pair
reviews.review_text: I've been wearing these Wrangler jeans for a while now, and they've quickly become my favorite pair. They're a perfect blend of comfort and classic style. The relaxed fit is exactly what I was looking for. It gives you plenty of room to move around comfortably without feeling restricted. What really makes these stand out is the stretch feature. The "Flex" fabric is a total game-changer, making them feel soft and comfortable from the moment you put them on. You can bend, sit, and move freely, which is perfect for an active day. I also really appreciate the timeless style and classic wash. They have a great look that's easy to pair with anything, whether I'm wearing a casual t-shirt or a nicer button-down. The blue wash is a versatile shade that works for almost any occasion. Overall, these jeans are a fantastic value. They're durable, comfortable, and look great, and I would definitely recommend them to anyone looking for a new go-to pair.

The jeans arrived on time and were delivered to the right part of the apartments front desk where I live.However my second order was cancelled that had the tshirts,jogging suit and shorts and now my money's on hold because of the cancellation,and I'm not happy about that

reviews.title: Wrong Washed Color Look from my previous Wrangler
reviews.review_text: Exchange my two 42‚Äù x 30‚Äù relaxed fit wrangler jeans üëñ unopened from their shrink wrapped plastic for the prior orders I'd received over a year ago. I'd inputted the current wrangler jeans I have from my previous purchase which is not the washed color jeans that should show in my history with my orders placed previously

You NEVER DELIVERED this item. Very frustrating and unfortunately what happened 6 out of 20 times. Why do you let people select an item if you have no intention of getting it to the customer? This is a terrible business model. You should rethink approach.

reviews.title: great price
reviews.review_text: I liked the colors, the way they fit , and the price was awesome. I like everything about these pants. My brother likes the pants and fits him comfortably. He's short, 4' 8" and he weighs about 150 lbs. I always get his pants hemed. He is disabled, and it would be to much to roll up.

reviews.title: good pants VERY THICK
reviews.review_text: the color is still strong even after washing. the fit is loose but that's perfect for me. my only complaint is they are NOT breathable and will make you overheat if you are doing physical activity or outdoors. otherwise these pants are fantastic for the $20 or so I paid.

I've been buying these jeans for a long time and I am happy they are still in stock and the quality or materials haven't changed. The price was a little more than I paid last time, but overall not too bad and not unexpected. The overall quality of the jeans are good but they do wear out quicker than other brands - but the cheaper price makes this also not unexpected.

A sad state of affairs where what used to be 100% cotton is now only 88% despite the inset on line that stated otherwise. Too much polyester and elastine in the product. Before stretch materials were 99% Cotton 1% Elastine, it's gone downhill since then. These feel more like slacks than jeans and if you look close the traditional denim now looks streaked. Just not a tribute to the staple Blue Jean... DISAPPOINTED. Only good was the fit but not the feel.

reviews.title: Very Nice Jeans
reviews.review_text: I like this style of jeans very comfy, relaxed fit but not baggy, I like the smaller back pockets and that I don't need to remove the belt loop near the button to close the jeans, the jeans I was getting before had bigger rear pockets and for some reason the first and last belt loops were so close to the button/zipper and wearing a belt made to hard to latch the belt. I like this style of jeans, Good Job Wrangler.

reviews.title: They lie
reviews.review_text: First and foremost Walmart said it was going to arrive with one one day and then it came a week later so no matter what it is one star I don't care tricked me you lied to me you scammed me however you wanna classify it you knew the day I put the order in. It wasn't coming in one day you know you're a liar.

reviews.title: dissappointed
reviews.review_text: like wrangler jeans. ordered 2 pairs size 44x30. received 1 pant 44x30 and 1 pant 40x30. I was disappointed about that. since my store didn't have any 44x30 i had to order them. so i had to find another walmart that had the correct size and return the wrong one. i attribute getting the wrong size to someone not looking at the size that was needed.

reviews.title: Good quality jeans
reviews.review_text: Jeans nice soft lots of choices of color. Accurate sizing . Just enough flex in fabric to not be stiff. Pockets are a bit shallow but not a deal breaker. 42x32 purchased a pair of bleached tint , and medium stone. Both very attractive and comfortable .good quality stitching and price was reasonable.

I placed order number 2000131-18001469 on Fri. April 11. I was informed it would arrive on Tue April 22. I haven't received it yet, so I went to USPS Tracking today. They're status is they were notified by shipper to expect it for mailing. They haven't received it yet. I need some help tracking it down.

reviews.title: Too Big/Runs Slightly Large
reviews.review_text: No issue with the jeans quality at all, just too big for my husband. He recently lost alot of weight quickly, and our vehicle is having issues also, so I had them delivered without him trying them on first. I did take his measurements %26 ordered the corresponding size, but still too big for him. No worries or problems with the jeans at all. I will start the return this week. TY

reviews.title: Why would anyone want to wear these?
reviews.review_text: I ordered these and a regular size for my husband, who is a pretty big guy, mind you. There are two different versions of these pants. One isn't in-store where we live which fit perfectly. Then there's these monsters that somehow made it on the shelves. These pants are just goofy looking. The pant legs are so wide my husband could probably fit both legs in one pant leg alone. I couldn't remember which ones these were, we had bought a pair recently and my husband was swimming in them, they cause you to massively sweat in high temps and cause rashes, so I ordered an extra pair of regular fit just in case. Of course the random color I chose for regular fit was unavailable and now my husband is left with these monstrosities for his construction interview today (yes, jeans are appropriate). Super frustrating. Please take these off the local shelf or add the ones that don't have "big men" in the title because not everyone needs that much room and they can't fit skinny jeans, which seems to be the other options.

reviews.title: Casual and comfortable
reviews.review_text: Fortunately, my wife knows how to take up the legs. I thought that I was a 42 X 30, but my wife found that I was a 42 X 28. The material is durable and the seat is comfortable. After I pressed them and put a crease in the legs, they look great. I plan to get another pair soon.

reviews.title: Great jeans with comfortable fit
reviews.review_text: These jeans have been a favorite of mine for years. Will continue to wear them as long as they are available. The only reason I did not rate as 5 was because the item received was not the one that I ordered. Wrong color - I kept them because I can always use another pair.

reviews.title: Definitely worth the price, very comfortable
reviews.review_text: I accidentally ordered relaxed jeans by mistake, but they are definitely worth the price. They aren't thick, but I ordered them for summer. Looks good. Definitely will buy another pair. I went to a big lot store last week and saw Levi's for $50-$60, these were $21.

I bought 3 pair of stretch jeans!!! the description of the product says: (Stretch denim fabric). The description is not accurate, and is not stretched at all. About this item Straight Fit Straight through seat and thigh Stretch denim fabric Sits below natural waist 5 pocket styling 2 scoop front pockets 2 spade hip pockets with "w" embroidery Floating watch pocket

Good material, tight in the seat and crotch, zipper is a man-eater (too short ! ) Pockets short enough for contents to fall out when you sit down. But theres nowhere to buy decent jeans for $20.00 !!!! Fair deal, why spend twice as much as necessary ???

reviews.title: Nice inexpensive big man jeans
reviews.review_text: Nice jeans at a good price. I buy them for my 6'4‚Äù grandson, who's a 2x. Unfortunately, they don't last all that long as he wears them low, below his belly, so he keeps splitting the rear seam, which tears not on the seam but the material along side. That's why I'm glad that they are inexpensive to replace

reviews.title: 29 Lengths are too long!
reviews.review_text: I usually get a 29 length for my jeans and they fit perfectly; however, these 29 length are way too long. I have to fold up the hems to make them work. I think this pair wasn't checked for quality purpose because they would have seen these were more like a 30 - 32 length.

reviews.title: 1st timer and wrangler jeans are awesome
reviews.review_text: I've been a Levi guy for a long time! I gave wrangler jeans a chance and im glad I did! Comfort, a little stretch and durable. I weld a lot and the burns don't go through this material. The cost is much less and the quality is is just as good as Levi's if not better!

reviews.title: Too big and baggy
reviews.review_text: Wrangler must not be consistent in their sizing or making of them, as this pair was way too baggy all around compared to our last pair, too bad we took tags off and washed them.

We went to our local Walmart, however they were not in stock. So to come home, order online, and have it delivered within a day was awesome. We still like to browse, in store, first. But, having this website is awesome. Thanks Walmart.

I kept trying to get my husband to buy these, but he would not. So, I ordered them online thinking he would probably tell me to send them back. I talked him into trying them on. These are now his favorite.
The waistband has flexible elastic inside it, that's one reason my husband prefers these jeans!! He's tried others, but only will wear these! These jeans wear good and always look nice!
The jeans themselves are great however what we received was not a flex waist. It could have been a mix-up in shipment, but be aware that might not be what you receive when you get them.

reviews.title: Wrangler Men's and Big Men's Relaxed Fit Jeans
reviews.review_text: I have enjoyed wearing Wrangler jeans since the 1970s at work and around the farm. They hold up well for a medium-weight jean and sell for a fair price.

reviews.title: HIRE AMERICANS
reviews.review_text: Walmart sent the WRONG items, they WERE NOT the FLEX waist jeans. This is the SECOND time they have sent the WRONG JEANS. Automate your shipping system and get rid of workers that can't read ENGLISH.
The quality and texture is great! They run a bit large (or maybe my husband has lost some weight)! Wish they had elastic in the waist! They wash well and feel soft!

reviews.title: Great jeans at a nice price
reviews.review_text: I'm loving these Wranglers. They're super soft right out of the bag. The minimally flexible fabric isn't noticeable to be different than regular denim at all. As far as sizing, it seems to be accurate.

reviews.title: Nice, but
reviews.review_text: The fabric has good stretch, and the color is nice, rich, black. He likes them, but XL just barely fits 5'11" 215 lb frame. Will definitely size up for another pair. If these shrink in the wash, we are done.

reviews.title: they rip out in a month of light wearing
reviews.review_text: they are so thin they rip out fast .. im getting a month if that out of them and they rip along the back pocket .. multiple pairs have doen this and one was also the crotch on the same day .. material definitely isnt like they used to be sadly

reviews.title: my Wal-Mart pick up order
reviews.review_text: walmart makes it so easy to order items to pickup .just go to walmart.com you will get an email eithin 2 hours just pull in to the covered parking spaces they load your order and you are on your way

reviews.title: Great fitting jeans
reviews.review_text: The jeans were a gift to my grandson. He is a teenager with autism and he doesn't like tight fitting garments, so the relaxed fit jeans were just right for him.

reviews.title: Great jeans for the price
reviews.review_text: The Wrangler jeans are cut for better comfort than any of the other brands I've tried. They are very durable and have pockets that are roomy without being too deep. The material holds up well for work, and they are relatively color fast.

reviews.title: Garbage SPANDEX denim made in India
reviews.review_text: Barely even denim, mostly SPANDEX, immediately returned them. Garbage quality product made in India Wrangler is no longer worth buying even for simple work jeans, better quality at Tractor Supply

reviews.title: Good jeans
reviews.review_text: Great jeans for the price. Fit true to size. Comfortable. Easy to move in. Durable for what you pay. Looks good too. We have purchased these multiple times.
My poor son had gain so much weight nothing he bought was comfortable fitting he loves the jeans I bought for him at Walmart he has bought 2 more pairs himself

reviews.title: Wrangler jeans
reviews.review_text: Bought these jeans for my husband and they were perfect . Fit was great. Great price, exactly as described. Washed up great and kept their color and shape. Would highly recommend these jeans.

Wrangler makes a quality product, good fit, large pockets, I have big hands and this is a problem with some jeans , comfortable, light weight, stretchy, nice looking, durable, inexpensive, a hard combination to come by these days.

reviews.title: Good Jeans for Work or Casual
reviews.review_text: My son needed dark blue jeans for work. He says these are very comfortable, good fit, and gives stretch when needed. Seems to not lose color in the early washings, which is a plus.

reviews.title: no true description
reviews.review_text: I had already bought a couple of the same and these are too small. Supposed to be the flex pants also and don't flex. these were NOT for me; they were gifts!!!
The price is good compared to similar products available elsewhere. This is one of the few places that still sells this style of the wrangler jeans that my family member really likes.
I have purchased these jeans before and they are still the same quality that I bought years ago. They are very comfortable and fit well, and as a big man that's important for my pants.

reviews.title: Perfect Jeans
reviews.review_text: These jeans are great! They are stylish and very well made and the Flex makes them very comfortable. They are true to size and fit perfectly. They go in the washer and dryer and come out looking perfect.

reviews.title: Great jeans for mechanics.
reviews.review_text: He needed work jeans that would stretch a little and fit loose enough to not pull hair on his legs when he stoops down and these jeans check all the boxes.

reviews.title: Not so thick
reviews.review_text: My husband uses these jeans for a work Jean and it is super thin and I suspect they will not last long. Appearance wise they are stylish for a summer look . They wash well and fit him good.

reviews.title: Love the Flex Fit
reviews.review_text: This is the 3rd pair of this particular style of Wrangler Jeans that I have bought and am thoroughly pleased with. The fact that the fabric can flex is what I love the most.

reviews.title: This is the product I will purchase next time you need jeans
reviews.review_text: They are comfortable and fit to a tee. I ordered in line and I messed up and ordered the wrong size. It was a breeze to cancel that order and reorder the size I needed.Loved the whole experience.

reviews.title: Pleased Customer
reviews.review_text: A tiny bit longer than similar Wranglers I have purchased in the past. Some thread ends/material not neatly finished. Easy to order, my size was actually in stock, and shipping was prompt. Very satisfied overall!

reviews.title: Denim Jeans for a Value Price
reviews.review_text: I purchased several pairs in various denim finishes for a gift for my father for Christmas both online and in store. Product was true to size, color variation in denim finishes were abundant. My father has a Jean length that is not usually in store so it was wonderful to have an option for him to try them on in store and ship several pair in other finishes.

reviews.title: Good sew job.
reviews.review_text: I worked for Wrangler for 12 years, was the manager of a sew plant in the eighties, they closed the plants in the USA and went to Mexico. So I transferred to VF outlet stores which owned Wrangler and Lee jeans. Point is for $13 you can't go wrong. We sold them for $15 in the 1995. The workmanship looks good, material is about the same, see how they hold up. First jeans I bought since 1999, so it took me 25 years to wear out my old ones.

reviews.title: Worth the money
reviews.review_text: All my boys wear these, I've got a semi drye my boys wear these, I've got a semi driver that has to get in out of a semi to hook up trailers, I've got another one that does tree work. They say they're the most comfortable jeans there ever was. Driver that has to get in out of a semi to hook up trailers, I've got another one that does tree work. They say they're the most comfortable jeans there ever was.

Whether he's engaging in rugged play or working hard on the farm, these jeans are built to last and provide versatility for a wide range of activities. The durable fabric stands up to the demands of everyday life, making these jeans a reliable wardrobe staple.

reviews.title: Amazing jeans

reviews.title: Sizing is dependable - quality TBD, fair price

I bought these for my husband for Christmas along with two other pair and he finally put the black pair on and they are a great fit comfortable and he was very grateful he got more new pants. But once I went to the wrangler, it changed it to 35x32 and I did not notice it. It has never done that before and I have ordered a lot of jeans for my husband through your sight.
